00076     lgRest  *appendRest( long int durN,
00077                       long int durD,
00078                      int dots,
00079                       long int durPosN,
00080                       long int durPosD )
00081     {
00082         lgRest *temp;

00084                               durD,
00085                               dots,
00086                               durPosN,
00087                        durPosD);
00088 
00089         appendEvent(temp );
00090         return temp;
00091     };
00092 
00094     void appendEmpty( long int durN,
00095                  long int durD,
00096                  int dots,
00097                  long int durPosN,
00098                  long int durPosD )
00099     {
00100         appendEvent( factory->newEmpty(durN,
00101                               durD,
00102                               dots,
00103                               durPosN,
00104                               durPosD) );
00105     };
00106 
00108     lgNote *appendNote( int pc,
00109                      int oct,
00110                      int acc,
00111                      long int durN,
00112                      long int durD,

00156     lgSequence *firstSequence( void )
00157     {
00158         curSequence = dynamic_cast<lgSequence *>(firstVoice());
00159         return curSequence;
00160     };
00161     lgSequence *nextSequence( void )
00162     {
00163         if( curSequence )
00164             curSequence = dynamic_cast<lgSequence *>(curSequence->next());
00165         return curSequence;
00166     };
00167 
00168     virtual string toString( lgVoice *callingSeq = NULL )
00169     {
00170         return lgChord::toString( callingSeq );
00171     }
00172         
00173     virtual void write( FILE *out, lgVoice *v = NULL )
00174         {
00175                 v = NULL;
00176                 lgChord::write( out, NULL );
00177         }
00178         
00179         virtual void writeFile( const char *fname )
00180         {
00181                 if( !fname )
00182                         return;
00183                 FILE *out;
00184                 out = fopen(fname,"wt");
00185                 if( !out )
00186                         return;
00187                 write(out);
00188                 fclose(out);
00189                 return;
00190         }
00191         // ls: einzeln Segment kann mehre Sequencen besitzen, die duch ID durchnummeriert werden. 
00192         lgSequence* searchByID(int n)
00193         {
00194                 if(!n) return NULL;
00195                 else
00196                 {
00197                         lgSequence *tmp=firstSequence();
00198                         while(tmp && tmp->getID()<n) tmp=nextSequence();
00199                         if(!tmp) return NULL;
00200                         else if(tmp->getID()==n) return tmp;
00201                         else return NULL;
00202                 }
00203         };
00204 
00205 };
